HyperV v1: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc136986(v=vs.85).aspx
HyperV v2: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh850078(v=vs.85).aspx

Errorcodes:
41000 WARN Cannot get Hypervisor (Win32_ComputerSystem) host information via WMI
41001 INFO The remotesystem is not a HyperV-Hypervisor
41002 WARN Cannot get Hypervisor (Win32_OperatingSystem) host information via WMI.
41003 WARN Cannot get Hypervisor (Win32_NetworkAdapter) host information via WMI.
41004 WARN Cannot get virtual machine list via WMI.
41005 WARN Cannot get virtual machine subtype via WMI.
